title: Sarah Spain's Bookcase
description: The KAJ assemble for a very important pod. They start with a voicemail about which athlete they would Escape a Room with, and then discuss the big news: Cam Newton is a Patriot (23:46), LIVERPOOL ARE CHAMPIONS (34:13), The NWSL Challenge Cup (41:00), and JR Smith is Back, Baby (53:14). Later, there's an in-depth analysis of Sarah Spain's bookcase (58:57), a Challenge Update (1:07:12), French News (1:24:59), and a very crucial question about wedgies (1:33:55).
itunes:title: Attention: the KAJ assemble for a very important podcast full of very important information.
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
